name: GlobalBlueGetEligibilityInformation
description:
Fetch the eligibility information for the current order.

When no BillingAddress is available on the Order, the country of residence has to be provided in the CountryCode field.

If the response TaxFreeAvailble is true, the user can proceed with calling the GlobalBlueStartTaxFree service.

If the response is false, tax free is not available. This can be due to several reasons:
- CountryEligibility == false: the selected CountryOfResidence is not eligible for TaxFree
- Amounts.AmountBelowMinimum: the total amount of the order is not enough to qualify for tax free, it should be at least Amounts.MinAmount
- Amounts.AmountOverMaximum: the total amount of the order is to much to qualify for tax free, it should be lower than Amounts.MaxAmount

properties.name: CountryCode
properties.description: Country of residence of the customer, overrides billingaddress CountryID

properties.name: AmountBelowMinimum
properties.description: Amount that should be added to the order to validate for TaxFree

properties.name: AmountOverMaximum
properties.description: Amount that should be removed from the order to validate for TaxFree

properties.name: CountryEligibility
properties.description: Is the provided country eligible for a taxfree form

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: TaxFreeAvailable
properties.description: Is this order eligible for a taxfree form
